entry.title: Python/OpenERP Developer
entry.summary:
Camptocamp «Business Solutions» team is looking for a Python/OpenERP Developer.
As Python/OpenERP Developer, you are interested in business management. You are experienced in object-oriented programming and in software architecture (on business application, if possible) and you are familiar with OpenERP.
Outgoing, you are able to work in a team and to understand clients’ needs.
entry.content:
Responsibilities

* Development and extension of the «OpenObject» framework and its existing modules
* Development of new functional business modules
* Project management with the «OpenERP» solution
* Software architecture and specifications writing
* High-level user support (technical)
* Involvement in the OpenERP project and experts member community

Skills

* Excellent OpenERP programming level with Python (Ruby, a plus)
* Knowledge in SGBD modelization and conception (PostgreSQL, a plus)
* Knowledge in financial and/or logistics processes, a plus
* Experience with an other ERP, a plus
* Knowledge of Linux, a plus

Profile

* Strong interest in Open Source
* 2 to 3 years of experience in object-oriented programming
* Computer engineering diploma or equivalent
* Languages: perfect French, English (written and spoken), spoken German a plus
* Independent, detail-oriented and responsible

Hiring dates
Immediately or to be agreed upon

Work site
Le Bourget Du Lac, France.
Profile
